tr.td: A NameValueCollection with the values for the QueryParams

section.title: JavaScriptEscape(System.String content) : System.String
section.p: Escapes JavaScript with Url encoding and returns the encoded string.

tr.td: The text to URL encode and escape JavaScript within.

section.title: UrlPathEncode(System.String content) : System.String
section.p: URL encodes the path portion of a URL string and returns the encoded string.

section.title: UrlEncode(System.String content) : System.String
section.p: URL encodes a string and returns the encoded string.

section.title: HtmlEncode(System.String content) : System.String
section.p: HTML encodes a string and returns the encoded string.

tr.td: The text string to HTML encode.

section.title: MapPath(System.String virtualPath) : System.String
section.p: Returns the physical path for the specified virtual path.
